extendedInfo.description: Loan Calculator designed specifically for INDIAN region.Our Loan calculator is easy to use and is quick to perform. Use our Loan calculator as a guide before availing for any kind of loan. This calculator let's you judge how affordable a loan can be for you. Always use the calculator to get a quick quote on your EMIs. You can calculate home loan, vehicle loan or any other kinds of loan EMIs with this calculator. If the quote satisfies you, then apply accordingly. It is this simple.â¢ Enter the Total amount you wish to avail in the Loan calculator.â¢ Enter the down payment in percentage or Valueâ¢ Then enter the loan term (years).â¢ And the rate of interest (reducing or fixed).â¢ Our Loan calculator will tell you just how much your Equated Monthly Installment (EMI) amount comes to. Along with your EMI you also get results like :â¢ total amount with interest.â¢ total interest amount.â¢ yearly interest amount. â¢ Graphical represented of Principal & Interest.
